articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: Iran Approves Emergency Use Of Domestic COVID Vaccine - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Iranian authorities say they have given emergency approval for a domestically developed vaccine against COVID-19 as the country battles the Middle East's deadliest coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: Sterling gives England opening Euro 2020 win over Croatia - CNA
articles.description: LONDON: Raheem Sterling finally found his tournament touch when his 61st-minute goal gave England a deserved 1-0 win over Croatia at Wembley on Sunday (Jun 13) as they began a European Championship with a victory for the first time in nine attempts.
